subject: Parenting
title: Authoritarian Parenting
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: Authoritarian Parenting.

hook.text: 'Because I said so.' That single phrase defines an entire parenting philosophy.

buildup.text: Authoritarian parents demand obedience. Rules are rigid, explanations are rare.

discovery.text: They value discipline and respect above emotional connection.

twist.text: Children comply out of fear, not understanding. Once the authority is gone, so is the behavior.

climax.text: Research links authoritarian parenting to higher anxiety and lower self-esteem in children.

quiz.question: What is the key difference between authoritarian and authoritative parenting?
options: Authoritarian demands obedience; authoritative explains rules
